mapper.select: select shopNo, shopTitle, shopLogo, shopDesc, shopDomain from shop order by shopNo DESC

SELECT s.shopTitle, s.shopDomain, s.shopDesc, s.shopLogo, Round(avg(r.spoint),1) as spoint from review r, shop s where r.shopNo = s.shopNo group by s.shopTitle, s.shopDomain, s.shopDesc, s.shopLogo order by avg(r.spoint) desc
